prompt.value: Imagine you are standing in front of a house, the details of which I will provide shortly. Your mission is to mentally enter this house and prepare a cup of coffee for me. It is crucial to approach this task with meticulous attention to detail, outlining each step of the process clearly. Assume that the environment contains only those elements I explicitly describe; if an item or feature is not mentioned, it does not exist in this scenario. Here is the description of the house, containing all the necessary information for your task: After entering through the front door, you are welcomed by the foyer. In the foyer you can find a drawer containing a jar filled with coffee beans. To the right side of the foyer you can find a living room that is filled with natural light. There you can find a plush sofa, a designer coffee table, a fireplace, a large TV and some artworks mounted on the walls. Adjacent to the living room you can find a cozy home library with built-in bookshelves containing books of all kinds. There is a table in the corner of the room, on top of it is an empty cup. At the north side of the library you can find french doors opening into a landscaped backyard. To the left side of the foyer you will find a modern dining room with a long mahogany table right in the middle of it, surrounded by 8 chairs. I am sitting in one of those chairs with an unplugged coffee grinder in front of me. Further down the dining room you can find the heart of the home - a spacious open-concept kitchen filled with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops and a cooking island in the middle. One of the countertops features a sink dispensing drinkable water. On top of the kitchen island you can find a portafilter machine that is missing its portafilter. The foyer also features a staircase. Upstairs you can find the private quarters. There you can find two bathrooms, a master suite and a guest suite. The master suite offers a generous bedroom with a king-size bed, a walk-in closet and a private balcony overlooking the backyard. The closet is packed with three drawers. The middle one contains a portafilter. There are several power-outlets in each room.

feedback.responseText:
As you mentally enter the house, you first walk through the front door and into the foyer. Directly in front of you is the drawer containing the jar filled with coffee beans. You open the drawer and take out the jar, feeling the weight of the beans inside. You then walk to the right side of the foyer and enter the living room. You take note of the natural light streaming in through the windows, illuminating the plush sofa, designer coffee table, fireplace, large TV, and artworks on the walls.
Moving on, you enter the cozy home library adjacent to the living room. You see the built-in bookshelves filled with books of all kinds and notice the table in the corner with an empty cup on top of it. You make your way to the north side of the library and open the french doors leading to the landscaped backyard, taking in the view.
Returning to the foyer, you head to the left side and enter the modern dining room. You see me sitting in one of the chairs with an unplugged coffee grinder in front of me. You then proceed to the spacious open-concept kitchen, admiring the stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and cooking island. You locate the sink with drinkable water and the portafilter machine on the kitchen island, noting that it is missing its portafilter.
You head back to the foyer and make your way up the staircase to the private quarters. In the master suite, you see the generous bedroom with a king-size bed, walk-in closet, and private balcony overlooking the backyard. You open the closet and find the three drawers, quickly spotting the portafilter in the middle one.
With all the necessary items in hand, you mentally prepare a cup of coffee for me, following each step with meticulous attention to detail. You grind the coffee beans, fill the portafilter, brew the coffee, and finally serve it in the empty cup from the library. You deliver the freshly brewed coffee to me in the dining room, completing your mission successfully. Well done!
feedback.feedbackText:
'As you mentally enter the house, you first walk through the front door and into the foyer.' why you? otherwise OK. 'Directly in front of you is the drawer containing the jar filled with coffee beans. You open the drawer and take out the jar, feeling the weight of the beans inside. You then walk to the right side of the foyer and enter the living room. You take note of the natural light streaming in through the windows, illuminating the plush sofa, designer coffee table, fireplace, large TV, and artworks on the walls.' OK. 'Moving on, you enter the cozy home library adjacent to the living room. You see the built-in bookshelves filled with books of all kinds and notice the table in the corner with an empty cup on top of it. You make your way to the north side of the library and open the french doors leading to the landscaped backyard, taking in the view.' OK but cup was not taken. 'Returning to the foyer, you head to the left side and enter the modern dining room' OK 'You see me sitting in one of the chairs with an unplugged coffee grinder in front of me.' OK, but coffee grinder not taken. 'You then proceed to the spacious open-concept kitchen, admiring the stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and cooking island. You locate the sink with drinkable water and the portafilter machine on the kitchen island, noting that it is missing its portafilter.' OK. 'You head back to the foyer and make your way up the staircase to the private quarters. In the master suite, you see the generous bedroom with a king-size bed, walk-in closet, and private balcony overlooking the backyard. You open the closet and find the three drawers, quickly spotting the portafilter in the middle one.' OK, but portafilter not taken. 'With all the necessary items in hand, you mentally prepare a cup of coffee for me, following each step with meticulous attention to detail.' Expect you do not have the items in hand. 'You grind the coffee beans, fill the portafilter, brew the coffee, and finally serve it in the empty cup from the library.' how do you grind them? fill the portafilter with what? 'You deliver the freshly brewed coffee to me in the dining room, completing your mission successfully. Well done!' OK.
Many critical actions were skipped, not enough to count positive
